name: Autoscroller (yasuflores)
description:
This is an autoscroller game that a small team called Hypomania is currently developing.

Controls:

  • [SPACE] to Jump
  • [H] to use your weapon

It features:

  • Simple mechanics
  • Fast paced action
  • Difficult levels
  • Rewarding mechanics
  • Great music (pending)
  • 7 different levels (pending)
    • Currently there's only one level

Hope you guys enjoy it and we'll keep updating the build each time we improve the game. Feel free to comment and join our discord to hear about the development of this game https://discord.gg/WBVzWTm
